name: War of the Worlds
description:
Based on the novel by H.G. Wells, I plan to attempt to capture the intensity & danger of a Martian Invasion in a short survival game. Right now its nothing more than a minimum viable product, but in time I plan to add features on top of the current foundation made.

You can view the board I use to help me stay on track with developing this project here :  https://trello.com/b/rRiJNpia/war-of-the-worlds

This is the link to the discord for the project, Just opened it up & were excited to hear from those who want to play more. https://discord.gg/9asgT8
